text.jpText: 走り出した瞳が目指すのは
text.enText: Forward into the race, with our eyes \nset on the once in a life time 'Glorious One-Moment'
Forward into the race, with our eyes \nset on the once in a life time 'Glorious One-Moment'

text.jpText: 勝利でしか掴めない奇跡
text.enText: The miracle that only appears with victory

text.jpText: 同じ時を彩ってく 輝きたちが 自分を見てるから
text.enText: There's something coloring our time \nIt's the countless radiance  And they are all looking at me

text.jpText: 限界なんて決められない 運命がライバル
text.enText: We won't decide on any limits only fate is our rival

text.jpText: Believe “dream” 憧れはもう挑戦になったんだ
text.enText: Believe "dream"  What we yearned for is now a challenge in front of us

text.jpText: Believe “pride” 舞台に立つんだって強い感情
text.enText: Believe "pride"  Standing on stage itself is also a sentiment

text.jpText: Believe “Yell” 応えたい気持ちも抱きしめ
text.enText: Believe "Yell"  These feeling that you want to answer, hold them dear

text.jpText: いま未来へゲートが開いてく レースが始まってく
text.enText: Right now the gate to the future is opening up \nThe race is now just starting up

text.jpText: 一斉、ターフに吹く風に変わる胸の奥の熱い想いは
text.enText: This gust of wind that is blowing all across this turf \nTurn it to this burning feeling deep inside

text.jpText: 誰にも譲れはしないから
text.enText: No matter who I face I will not give it up

text.jpText: 駆け抜けてく速度は私たちの叫びなんだ
text.enText: The speed that we rush through in our stride is the truest essence of our cry

text.jpText: 競い合うほどに響いてく (Running to the top!)
text.enText: As long as we are competing it will resonate (Running to the top!)

text.jpText: 栄光というゴールへと向かうDestinies! (Glorious Moment!)
text.enText: Glory's what we call the goal of running towards destiny (Glorious Moment!)

text.jpText: そう、たった一度 たった一度の奇跡
text.enText: Happens only once, a one and only miracle

text.jpText: (Running to the top! Running to the top!)

text.enText: (Running to the top! Glorious One Moment!)
